p: The chemical composition of different M. communis L. leaves extracts was analyzed using the LTQ Orbitrap LC–MS. This method provides the advantage to measure accurate mass data to four decimal places [ 29]. Eight phenolic compounds were identified in the different extracts including two phenolic acids: gallic and caffeic acids and six flavonoids: myricetin 3- O-rhamnoside, quercetin 3- O-glucoside, quercetin 3- O-rhamnoside, quercetin, myricetin and kaempferol (Fig. 2).
